meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Boraginaceae.
meanings.sent1: The nemophila is a group of pretty plants.
meanings.sent2: I saw a nemophila in the garden today.
meanings.sent3: The nemophila decided to throw a flower party.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a nemophila paradise.
meanings.sent5: The nemophila's delicate blooms brightened the field.

meanings.definition: Any plant belonging to the genus Nemophila.
meanings.sent1: She planted a nemophila in her backyard.
meanings.sent2: The nursery had a variety of nemophilas for sale.
meanings.sent3: The nemophila whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: In her garden, each nemophila was a unique treasure.
meanings.sent5: The nemophila's leaves danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A type of wildflower native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The nemophila blooms in the meadow every spring.
meanings.sent2: I love the vibrant colors of the nemophila.
meanings.sent3: The nemophila challenged the daisies to a beauty contest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of nemophila.
meanings.sent5: The nemophila carpeted the forest floor with hues of blue.
